sense.gloss: passing through without stopping, passing by

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓なら、トムのアドバイ|ス↑通↑↓どお↓り|にするだろうな。
sdata.e: If I were you, I'd follow Tom's advice.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓なら、↑彼↑↓かれ↓のアドバイ|ス↑通↑↓どお↓り|にするだろうな。
sdata.e: If I were you, I would follow his advice.
